channel.title: Biagi on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Biagi on Simba Tango

item.title: Tango Tunes
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: The first results are trickling down from the TangoVia project. Tango Tunes is a Vienna based organisation, digitizing music with the help from TangoVia. They recently provided a preview of what they will offer, and I have to say I think it sounds very good. The Troilo sample in particular was very promising. The first songs available for purchase are 100 Biagi songs. The price is EUR 100, which is expensive compared with commercial releases, but cheaper than the Japanese labels.
